website_summaries.verdict: Bring back a sense of the 1950s with this retro coffee table. Unique leg supports contrasts well with the tabletop and surrounding design elements.
pros: Great sense of retro styling that adds an extra dimension to any mid-century style living room
cons: Smaller legs can move around on hard surfaces without gliders

customer_reviews.title: Beyond beautiful! Was looking for something inexpensive that had more ...
customer_reviews.text: Beyond beautiful! Was looking for something inexpensive that had more of an industrial/rustic look. The price is great, the shipping was earlier than expected, the assembly took less than five minutes and the color is true to picture. Really makes the room! Can not say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mid century magnificent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the table along with the matching TV stand for my living room. The table is of good quality for the price point and simple to assemble, with all the necessary hardware and tools enclosed. They even provide a couple extra pieces in the event that you should lose one. It appears to be sturdy and stable, and should serve your coffee table needs as long as you don't intend to tap dance on it wearing a lampshade on your head. I'm happy with my purchase and will definitely buy more home furnishings from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: it was cheap and looked like it would pair well with the sofa I'm still ...
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the fake wood grain. But hey, it was cheap and looked like it would pair well with the sofa I'm still waiting for after two weeks. UPDATE: the legs are great! Very sturdy. Table was easy to put together. However, the finish nothing short of garbage. After approximately a month of use, the surface has two bubbles around light scratches, and now has peeled up at one corner, FYI it's a giant sticker. There is no sealant over it whatsoever. I certainly would not purchase again, let alone recommend it, not for $60. This is a $30 table.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but the photos are misleading on its color
customer_reviews.text: I will give this two stars because I love the height and legs. I feel, however, that the photos in the post are misleading and I have asked Amazon to correct it if possible. I thought this table was gray, based on the photos. I admit my misunderstanding of Sonoma oak as the type of wood and not the color as I later found out. If you want a light oak color, then buy. If you think this table is gray, don't buy it. I ended up painting over it.
customer_reviews.author: LARRISA B TURNER

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We had this table for a couple of weeks and the edge started to peel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: Looks (looked) great at first. The top is definitely fake wood, but not ugly. However, a few drops of water touched the table top (and I was using a coaster, so it wasn't a lot of water) and now a few areas are puffy/bubbling up. This thing has zero water resistance whatsoever, which isn't really practical for a coffee table. I'm giving it two stars because I like the design, and for the price I paid I can repurpose the legs with a better tabletop. But this is way less durable than a comparably priced item from Ikea, for example.
customer_reviews.author: P M

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DESIGN, VERY STURDY LEGS-PERFECT COFFEE TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to find a cool looking, sleek, light weight coffee table that had a modern contemporary feel and design to it so that I could have my art friend paint it in a coastal modern contemporary design- I absolutely love it! the legs are sexy! The table out of the box was also gorgous but I wanted color more than reclaimed wood- I loved the design & legs and it arrived quick and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: Yes to hairpin legs!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little table for the price. I was particularly drawn to the iron hairpin legs and they are pretty awesome in person. The table top is a light grey and completely satisfactory - this table was purchased for the legs and I was happy to have whatever top as long as it wasn't ugly or cheap looking and this is neither. The table is a perfect height for a coffee table or a table for an entry way to put keys, etc on when you walk in the door. You could also totally use it as a desk. Highly recommend. I cannot imagine a better table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MSH7

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this a couple of months ago and we really like it. We bought a lot of the other furniture pieces in Altra series too. Delivery took about a week. Once we received it, it was very easy to assemble. All the tools and pieces were clearly labeled. Maintenance is also very easy. The only reason why I'm not giving this 5 stars is because the wood-like top seal does bubble when liquid is left on its surface. Once we discovered it, we avoid that issue by using coasters :-)
customer_reviews.author: CypherPtV

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for a $60 coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for a $60 coffee table! I love the hairpin legs and gray colored vinyl top. We didn't have any issues with it arriving broken or bent. It has not given us any problems with normal use. I will update this post if it gets worn out too quick. Product is given 4 stars instead of 5 because I can tell that the top vinyl is pretty cheap. I may just cover it with a wood grain contact paper if it ever rips or has issues.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great table, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, and doesn't have that 'flimsy' feel that a lot of cheaper tables like this can give you. My son uses this in our basement for his gaming setup. Went with this model specifically because of the metal legs. So far has survived without any dings, or having the legs loosen up like others have.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee/cocktail table! It looks even better than I had anticipated. It took me longer to unpack it than it did to assemble it. The legs go on with JUST the hex wrench (included) and it takes you all of sixty seconds per leg. BOOM, done! It matches my Ameriwood Home "Haven" retro desk with riser in "Weathered Oak" PERFECTLY. Looks awesome in our little Airbnb suite and we hope our guests love it as much as we do!
customer_reviews.author: Edward King

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: i really wanted to like this but as an avid online furniture buyer and builder, there is so much better out there. the corner arrived broken so of course i immediately planned on returning itanyway, but besides that the top is particle board that is extremely heavy for no reason, and it's very cheap looking which of course it is cheap but still.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Ram

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect piece for my living room. I love retro/ mid century pieces but they are just not practical for my house. I have always had a weak spot for hair pin legs. This piece is very sturdy and well made and very easy to put together. I also bought the matching end tables!
customer_reviews.author: Bookishowlet

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice and feels solid but the top did not hold up at all. I would only recommend this if you are religious about using coasters and being vigilant about not letting a drop of liquid ever touch this. The top bubbled and then peeled. I'll attempt to put something over it to not have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: KB-Boise

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance of getting a damaged one, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: You have a 50/50 chance of getting a damaged one first, but they did send me a replacement that was undamaged. This was super easy to set up and I like the minimalist look. For the price I would recommend it, just be ready to return the first one
customer_reviews.author: Grace Havran

customer_reviews.title: Really nice table!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and elegantly looking table! The wood itself is heavy and the laminate was done properly. Very easy to assemble. Just used my hand to put the screw and use the included wrench to tighten it. I love the look of the wood too. Matches all the other furniture in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Vivs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sturdy and exactly what I was looking for for my little living room.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Legs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use the legs with a different top and replace our current coffee table. It arrived very quickly but the top is a lot smaller than I expected (which does not matter to me since I purchased for the legs only). A few of the other reviews commented on the poor quality of the top, but I do not think it is too terrible. It will not last as long as a solid wood top, but it still looks nice! The legs are great though!
customer_reviews.author: AK82

customer_reviews.title: good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this coffee table is great. It definitely doesn't look expensive, but it is well-designed and chic. It doesn't have any texture, since it's just wood veneer, and its shininess looks kind of cheap and institutional. But it looks really nice paired with a plant and a textured rug. The hairpin legs seem to be good quality. We are moving in the next few years and don't want to accumulate more furniture we'll need to take with us, so this coffee table is perfect for right now. We plan to replace the cheap top with a solid wood one after we move. The price for this coffee table is almost worth it just for the hairpin legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Just have to screw in the legs, takes no time to put together. Sturdy, nice looking table. Great neural color. It’s smaller than I thought so pay attention to the dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: literally the best $45 i ever spent
customer_reviews.text: literally the best $45 i ever spent. It took my boyfriend 4 minutes to put this together. its simple, its modern, its rustic, it matches perfectly with my farmhouse style tv stand, i love it . i have a small apartment and this table just fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGE
customer_reviews.text: Beyond irritated!!! I bought this thinking I would have no damage, I just am so irritated with it!!! I feel like what I paid for it should not have this much damage! Almost a waist of my money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Maine

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Obviously easy to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Obviously easy to disassemble, but the legs are an eyesore. Watch out for any stickers or tape touching the table, since the grain and wood pattern is just a flimsy printed paper and it will get easily destroyed. I bought it 3 years ago, already looking to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great look but veneer scratches/rips too easily
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table except its remarkably thin veneer which resembles rice paper in thickness and texture. You will probably be fine if you’re not using coffee tables for anything other than housing remote controls, magazines, knickknacks, etc. The rip in the attached pictures happened when cleaning up after opening Xmas presents; a piece of tape on wrapping paper had unbeknownst to me attached to the table and the veneer came right off when I bunched up all the paper. It’s unfortunate because I otherwise really like this table. In fact, I’d pay twice the price for a better quality veneer.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish but the quality is NOT!
customer_reviews.text: The table is very stylish for the price, but the quality is NOT. Its basically a sticker that will come of and then the table just looks horrible. I called the company, and after 1 year there is nothing they can do...see the attached picture! Buy it if you need it less then a year lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Galinski

customer_reviews.title: Once I opened the box and saw them I was so excited because they looked great. We put them together
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the coffee table, end table and desk. I was nervous because they were so cheap. Once I opened the box and saw them I was so excited because they looked great. We put them together. Assembly was very easy and quick. They are very sturdy and look amazing. We've had them for a couple months now and they are holding up great with the kids. Everyone who comes over says how much they love them! They definitely do not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lavallee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was hesitant bc it looks tall for a coffee table, and when it came it was also heavy. Now that its put together. Its a beautiful piece for the money. It has plenty of surface for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine W.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, transitional piece
customer_reviews.text: We got what we paid for but not in a negative wa! It is completely functional and good value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted when looking for a simple table for the salon! matches the decor perfect
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love this set
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this set. It's nice and sturdy for the price. Just a hair darker than I expected but not even an issue. I've bought the end tables, entertainment center, and coffee table and I'm seriously considering the desk. It's a pressed wood, but thick and sturdy, super easy to put together, and the legs are good quality metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  H.

customer_reviews.title: blah
customer_reviews.text: even considering the price, this wasn't all that. The hair pin legs are fantastic but the table top is pretty small and reminiscent of IKEA furniture with a sticker for fake wood grain. Luckily was able to resell after using in staging a property for 50% of my original investment.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: but since the table looks nice as it is
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm really impressed with this coffee table. I really only bought the table to use the legs and make a new table top, but since the table looks nice as it is, I am in no rush to replace the top. A friend of mine thought that I had purchased it at West Elm the first few months I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlie

customer_reviews.title: Great table. More than worth it for the hairpin ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table. More than worth it for the hairpin legs alone. I had originally purchased it intending to use the legs on a different table top. But I liked the clean simple look so much that I use it as is.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. It's the nicest cheapest coffee table I found online.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal. Looks nice. Nothing flashy or super functional but it gets the job done. Lots of surface area and the legs are super sturdy. I was looking at the end tables but I think I'll hold off they come down in price a little.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Calson

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, took about 15 minutes...took more effort to unpack it from the box than it did to put the legs on....goes beautifully with the Seneca TV stand and Altra Owen Retro Desk....it's a sturdy piece of furniture, clean lines and very attractive....
customer_reviews.author: maryann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy, functional, and cute! I purchased several pieces from the same collection and I love them. Use coasters with drinks though!
customer_reviews.author: Gatts’

customer_reviews.title: Don't Put Any Tape On It
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect fit to my rustic theme living room. However I had put a tiny piece of scotch tape on the edge for just a few seconds and when I peeled it off the paint came off too! To quick fix it I had to shade the spot with a ball point pen.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Five stars.
customer_reviews.text: Mine wasn’t damaged at all. Super easy to put up, took like 15 minutes. Came with extra screws. I wouldn’t put hot beverages on this table just to be careful. If you’re gonna put hot drinks, put something on it first. I’m only using this for my makeup or even to study and it’s perfect for a laptop too. It’s low so I wouldn’t suggest using a chair with this. It’s more like a chill table to sit on the floor with.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: but very very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: ended up returning it before even attempting to build it. We needed a sturdier coffee table to put our feet up on, and the product details made this seem quite fragile. A bit of an impulse buy that ended up being returned, but very very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend you don't buy this table, espixally if you have kids this was a piece of tape that was barley stuck on it and when taken off this happen, that's called cheap. - also I got this October like 3rd so not even 2 months and the paint is chipping ... again cheap I'll be contacting amazon to see what I can do because this is not okay. Horriable ..
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Buttrey

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together and it has a great "retro" ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a text message saying that it will be delivered on Feb 8 but arrived on Jan 20th so it came 3 weeks early. It was very easy to put together and it has a great "retro" look. My only complaint which is minimal is that it's a little more narrow from front to back than I thought but I'll make it work. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Turbo Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I always like to sit with my legs under the coffee table when I eating. The sharp edges here make that quite uncomfortable. It's also really light and moves around if you like using it as an ottoman. It's otherwise sturdy and attractive, would make decent college or guest furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest assembling ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great cocktail table. The easiest piece of furniture I have ever put together. Instructions are clearly written, pieces are well packed, and they send you spare pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this table. Unfortunately you can tell it won't last long. Upon arrival it already had a crack in it. (I live in NYC and do not feel like dealing with the hassle of returning or exchanging it) It's not solid wood, so it will probably chip pretty easily. You pay for what you get. I will try to find a cover or something for it so it won't wear as fast. It was however incredibly easy to put together. Not in love but it will do!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table. I bought it as a warehouse deals so I got it for a little bit cheaper. I was expecting a little bit of damage but it came in perfect condition and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the table expecting to only use the legs... was pleasantly surprised how nice and solid the simple table looked once it was in our home!
customer_reviews.author: djm

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Wow, great product! The price is great (and lower than what is listed on Wayfair), the quality is as expected, no problems or damages with the delivery, and the table is easy to put together. Love the look and am really happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but breakable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Beautiful aesthetics. Durability is questionable. It bends in half easily. If a friend comes over and leans on this table, or heaven forbids sits on it, it will absolutely break in half.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Noel

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table, super easy to asemble! Proper size for a coffee table. One thing to notice-be careful with hot drinks as it is super easy to leave damage on the surface also due to heat and water the surface scratched out eventually(2 months).
customer_reviews.author: VYTAUTAS  ATKOCAITIS

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now and I really love it. I wish it came in a larger size but it’s a perfect fit for my living room and the quality is pretty dang good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Eklange

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy, stylish and easy to clean. My friends really like it - they immediately saw the "retro" style. It helps that I put a shag carpet underneath it. (: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: great deal & easy installation
customer_reviews.text: i love this table! looks amazing, esp for the price, and only took about 20 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute Legs- Tabletop Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love the look of the legs, but wish the top was better quality. After only a little use it already started bubbling. The table is really sturdy though, the legs are solid metal and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES...but no
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coffee table! My only complaint is that the color is NOT the cool grey it appears, but rather more of a sandalwood color. Blech!
customer_reviews.author: Neener Nonner

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and modern
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and modern. Great price. Chips very easily and the top material came off when i got a piece of tape stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: ah12065

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Bank Remodel, went perfect with set up, perfect height. Looks exactly like the picture. A bit darker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a lot, but this is great! I love the color and its rustic feel. I got this during the deal of the day and am quite impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I bought the matching tv stand, and found a bookshelf on Amazon that matches the wood color. It is AMAZING for the price and we always get compliments on it! Make sure to use coasters though, because it will make the "wood" bubble.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Product has a small tare down the middle of the top of the coffee table. I had ordered this table to replace a previous one that had the top bubble up from sitting in the sun. My end table was delivered with a gash as well. Although it looks good in the photos, this product is garbage. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bevy Kevy

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: It is more of a brown color than the gray that is shown. I needed gray to match the decor of the room. Not happy but cannot box it back up to return
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Weimert

customer_reviews.title: Love my table
customer_reviews.text: Love my table. It's so chic and classy at the same time! It is slightly lower than I expected but still does the job! I love that it is gray in color like I had hoped, it does have slight brown color to it as well because of the wood finish, but definitely more gray! yay! :)
customer_reviews.author: ZahraH83

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Cute table, but it arrived damaged. After putting it together, I saw that the corner of the table was damaged. Not sure if it's worth returning or nor. I'm definitely not thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carin Lane

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. First one started peeling within a month. Returned and ordered a new one. New one started peeling within a month as well.
customer_reviews.author: Njgirl

customer_reviews.title: It is not fancy but it is kid proof.
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. It fit s great with my sectional and it easy to clean from all of my grand kids. It is not fancy but it is kid proof.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Matthews

customer_reviews.title: We get compliments whenever someone walks into our house and ...
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments whenever someone walks into our house and sees this table, which is hilarious since it's so cheap. The fake wood finish is not nearly as tacky as you would think. We're going to keep the current tabletop as long as it lasts and then reuse the legs. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table) I bought for a 1
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table) I bought for a 1,5 year child. So it combines the function of table for child's activities and regular living room table.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Easily damaged with moisture.
customer_reviews.text: Long time amazon shopper here and this is my first review... Super cheap, easy to build and quality was what you would expect for something at this price point. The top will bulge the moment you leave any standing moisture. I had a wet napkin that sat for, I’m not kidding, 5 min and resulted in a damage top. See pics, hard to tell but super noticeable in person.
customer_reviews.author: angel beltran

customer_reviews.title: Modern sleek look, great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It is really cool looking and just great for the price. The top is a kind of warm driftwood gray color, which looks really pretty. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: The coffee table is a great size and has a sleek look to it. Putting it together was simple took about 25 minutes or so. I really like the end result and hope to put together some furnitures to match it.
customer_reviews.author: Jas.

customer_reviews.title: Table Ok
customer_reviews.text: Love the design but the top will damage easily so be careful what you put on it. Not really heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfectly fine with no scratches or damages. Super easy to assemble! Very simple cool looking modern coffee table for a good price considering it doesn't require a big car or truck to pick up and haul to your house.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and sturdy. A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Talk about quality. Very heavy and sturdy. A great buy. Seller was fantastic too. Will order from Dorel Home again!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Paper laminate peeled immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp edges and the paper laminate peeled within a month. Not bad for the price but the legs are worth more than the table itself.
customer_reviews.author: jahouck

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and I love the design. I also bought the tv stand and next I'm buying the end table. My apt looks so stylish.
customer_reviews.author: dollface

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My table did not come damages and I've been using it for half a year now. Still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Diana E.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look, simply assembly. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Looks great, feels very sturdy, and was very simple and quick to assemble. However, beware that the corners may be sharp. I've cut my leg twice this week and scratched it several more times; need to give yourself enough space to walk past, and may need modification if you've got little kids or big dogs
customer_reviews.author: Scout R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - use a coaster or pay the price
customer_reviews.text: For goodness sake, make sure you use coasters. I am so disappointed as this table is easy to assemble, the price is affordable, and it does look nice. However, I placed a glass of water on it and it left a welt in the top that does not go away. (I have added a photo so you can see what happens.) I really love the table other than that so if you buy just make sure you keep it dry!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stombres

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you spill liquids on these they bubble and peal.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not gray at all
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to gray, it's a brown color and top came scratched. Easy to assemble , good size but but the color I thought it was
customer_reviews.author: Jritth01

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! No damage during packaging/delivery. (was a bit hesitant after reading previous reviews) Overall, a solid table for half the price that I saw it for on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Williams41

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, clean lines, looks just as advertised. No complaints. It's a nice piece of furniture and all you have to do is add the legs.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE  FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This table looks even better than on the Amazon website. The great price made me wonder about it (quality, etc.) but I am not disappointed whatsoever. For the money, it's a great table.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good, Affordable Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table! It was affordable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: paul morgan

customer_reviews.title: its exceptionally sturdy and looks great in my apartment
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, its exceptionally sturdy and looks great in my apartment. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for something cheap but looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite coffee table I've ever purchased. It's simplistic and modern in design and does its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Table
customer_reviews.text: I adore this coffee table and get a lot of compliments on it. Took me about 10 mins to put together. The directions weren't too helpful but common sense was. I plan on purchasing the matching end tables as well. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Still loving my coffee table. Got it a while ago. Have had zero problems with it and it was quite easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, very cute
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with large scratch on underside. Packaging undamaged. Very sturdy, very cute. (Using on carpet, fyi)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with my gray walls and dark charcoal sofa
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with my gray walls and dark charcoal sofa. Love the hairpin legs and the mid century modern design. Also bought the end table and T.V. stand. Heavy duty product, will not fall apart. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Wellllll the legs are nice
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I can't expect a whole lot especially for the price I paid. The finish on the top is kinda wimpy and no matter how tight the legs are it is kinda wobbly and sad. But it's cheap. Cool looking and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table is of good quality construction. I don't love the laminate top a whole lot. Could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Orlandeaux

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy how this table looks! It's not the largest but it's just big enough to place a few decorative things on. Does not seem cheap!
customer_reviews.author: roylfewkes

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of the wood and the skinny legs
customer_reviews.text: I got this table because my living room is tiny. It's a really chic table, I love the color of the wood and the skinny legs. It is a bit wobbly for some reason by otherwise is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen T

customer_reviews.title: It's quite annoying to return
customer_reviews.text: Item came without two of the legs, screws, or any instructions. Item seems to have been opened previously and was hastily repackaged. It's quite annoying to return, as it is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Fray

customer_reviews.title: cool, and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Again, I bought the matching end tables, sleek, cool, and inexpensive. Together they make a really nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Ran Dylam

customer_reviews.title: I will look for a cool old piece of wood and use these legs
customer_reviews.text: The fake wood top is kinda janky but the legs make up for it. I will look for a cool old piece of wood and use these legs. For the price, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks more expensive than it was. Really nice piece for the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bought the desk too!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the coffee table alone, but it was so easy to set up and the quality vs price was so good I bought the desk too. Minimalistic but very cute!
customer_reviews.author: CreativeLivingTips

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table for a decent size living room
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It's light and super smart looking. Not as wide as I expected but will do the job. Happy with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: A Shah

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Altra Owen Retro Coffee Table with Metal Legs, Distressed Gray Oak
product_meta.description: Brighten up your space with the Ameriwood Home Owen Retro Coffee Table. This slim table is designed to fit into compact spaces with ease. In fact, measuring in at 17.85"h x 42"w x 19.5"d, this table can make small rooms seem less cluttered. Able to hold u
feature_bullets: Add an industrial flare to your room with the Ameriwood Home Owen Retro Coffee Table
Holds up to 40 lbs. on the spacious tabletop
Minimal assembly required. Dimensions: 17.85"h x 42"w x 19.5"d. Shipping weight is approximately 27.94 lbs
Gunmetal gray legs accent the distressed brown oak table surface
This piece is made from laminated particleboard with powder-coated metal legs
